description: These picnic-worthy chocolate cherry rum balls are coated in delicious coconut and bursting with tangy cherry. A must-try recipe.
name: Chocolate Cherry Rum Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place melted chocolate in a small bowl and coconut in a separate bowl. Using a fork, dip balls in chocolate, shaking off excess, then roll in coconut to coat. Return balls to tray and refrigerate until set.
